%% User management class diagram
classDiagram
    direction TB

    class User {
        +userID: String
        +email: String
        +fullName: String
        +phone: String
        +password: String
        +role: UserRole
        +status: Boolean
        +createdAt: Date
        +updatedAt: Date
    }

    class Customer
    class RestaurantPartner
    User <|-- Customer
    User <|-- RestaurantPartner

    class UserRole {
        <<enumeration>>
        customer
        owner
        admin
    }

    class UserController {
        +getAllUsers(req, res)
        +getOwners(req, res)
        +getCustomers(req, res)
        +getUserById(req, res)
        +updateUser(req, res)
        +deleteUser(req, res)
        +updateUserStatus(req, res)
    }

    class UserService {
        +createOwner(ownerData)
        +createCustomer(customerData)
        +updateUser(id, userData)
        +getAllUsers()
        +deleteUser(userId)
        +getAllCustomers()
        +getAllOwners()
        +getUserById(userId)
        +updateUserStatus(userId, status)
    }

    class UserDAO {
        +getAllUsers()
        +getUserById(id)
        +createOwner(data)
        +createCustomer(data)
        +updateStatusUser(id, status)
        +updateUserInfo(id, updates)
        +deleteUser(id)
        +findByEmail(email)
        +getCustomers()
        +getOwners()
    }

    class DBConfig
    class DTOUtils

    %% relationships
    UserController --> UserService : uses
    UserService --> UserDAO : uses
    UserDAO --> User : persistence
    DBConfig --> UserDAO : models
    DTOUtils --> UserDAO : toDTO / toDTOs
    User --> UserRole
    Customer -- User
    RestaurantPartner -- User

    %% notes
    %% Diagram reflects `server/src/controllers/UserController.js`, `server/src/services/userServices.js`, and `server/src/dao/userDao.js`
